column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We also ordered seafood paella for 4
column2: and it came a little while after we were done with our tapas. The paella was kind of bland and our scallops and shrimp were way too salty. My mom said we should've sent it back
column3: but half of us were already done with our plates
column4: haha. Definitely not the best paella I've had.
